item.name: Home
item.description: Original recipe from the legendary Cooking with Dog. Cooking Time: 60 minutes Recipe Difficulty: Easy Servings Amount: 16 Recipe Lead: …for when your mom commands you to bake something… Ingredients Cookies. 200g cake flour 60g almond meal 1tsp salt 120g dairy free butter 100g confectioner’s sugar 3 tbsp aquafaba (bean juice) 1 tbsp soy milk […]
